name: Girl vs Zombie: Running And Chasing
name_original: Girl vs Zombie: Running And Chasing
description:
A pretty girl is chased by zombies. She needs help. Save her!

You will need to exercise your fingers. Most important, you need to be fast.

Tap on the items. The red arrow will accelerate the girl’s speed. The black arrow will let the girl slow down. When the grass is tapped, either the girl or the zombie will be stopped.

Have fun! :-)

Highlights:
•Addictive gameplay, easy and fun
•Chased by zombie
•Pretty girl
•Powerful items
•Well-designed graphics and sounds
•Game Center Support
•It’s FREE!!!
